name: Collection of Goods
tooltip:
Collection of GoodsLevel 60

Bring 40 Runecloth, 6 Arcanite Bars, 10 Arthas' Tears, 5 Stratholme Holy Water vials, and 150 gold to Grimand Elmore in the Dwarven District of Stormwind.

Requirements:
- Stratholme Holy Water x 5
- Arthas' Tears x 10
- Runecloth x 40
- Arcanite Bar x 6
- Money:150
